name: The kikimora
description:
In this game, you play as an expert in esoteric art, in the early 20th century. A russian dacha is haunted by an evil kikimora. Your job is to defeat her, but if you lack caution, you might be to one in danger !

WASD to move.
1 to equip the lantern.
2 to equip the chalk.
3 to equip the salt.

In order to defeat the kikimora, you have to find her doll, hidden in the house. The "Help" menu will explain how to proceed and teach you how to defend yourself.
